text: St. Maries Municipal Airport is a county-owned public use airport located in St. Maries, a city in Benewah County, Idaho. The airport is approximately one mile northwest of downtown St. Maries. It was first opened in April, 1940, and sits on 65 acres of land. ==References== Category:Airports in Idaho Category:Buildings and structures in Benewah County, Idaho Category:Transportation in Benewah County, Idaho
title: St. Maries Municipal Airport
